translations: n．八分之一：一个整体被分成八等份的每一份。
· He divided the cake into eighths.

sentences.sentence: It was five-eighths of an inch thick.
sentences.translation: 它只有八分之五英寸粗。

sentences.sentence: Seven-eighths of my stock is old-fashioned.
sentences.translation: 我的存货八分之七都是老式的。

sentences.sentence: One kilometer is equal to five eighths of a mile.
sentences.translation: 一公里等于八分之五英里。
